channel.title: Requesting a 2D Graphics Designer
channel.description: First, if you are remotely interested, check out this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539866.0.html We are looking for anyone who can create 2D interfaces. This includes, but isn't limited to: Interfaces for lockpicking, skinning, looting, alchemy, publishing, and scribing (just some of the things we have in the works or are thinking of implementing). I believe you do not need to know the actual specifics for adding them into the client, but I may be wrong. You will be working alongside [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=265468]badger41[/url] who will be adding the interfaces into the client. If you have any questions send a personal message to me or [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=258047]Scarecrows[/url] and we will be sure to answer them.

item.title: Requesting a 2D Graphics Designer

@Scarecrows wrote:

Sounds great! Send me your contact details

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting a 2D Graphics Designer
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

First, if you are remotely interested, check out this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539866.0.html
We are looking for anyone who can create 2D interfaces. This includes, but isn’t limited to: Interfaces for lockpicking, skinning, looting, alchemy, publishing, and scribing (just some of the things we have in the works or are thinking of implementing). I believe you do not need to know the actual specifics for adding them into the client, but I may be wrong. You will be working alongside badger41 who will be adding the interfaces into the client. If you have any questions send a personal message to me or Scarecrows and we will be sure to answer them.

Read full topic
